findings.title: Assertion flaw issue
findings.description: In the swap module, the mint function does not check if the added liquidity amount meets MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY when adding liquidity for the first time. If the MINIMUM_LIQUIDITY is not met, the protocol will throw an overflow error instead of ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_LIQUIDITY_MINTED.

findings.title: Not checked if pair has been created
findings.description: In swap_exact_output_doublehop, swap_exact_input_triplehop and swap_exact_output_triplehop respectively, but do not check whether a pair is created first.
